name: Volume (biological)
definition: Physical brain volume to be mapped

name: Number of neurons
definition: Number of neurons in the given volume
ref_note: Based on State of Brain Emulation report

name: Years until start
definition: Years from now when initial purchases are made

name: Max parallel GPUs
definition: Number of GPUs dedicated during processing

name: Data science development
definition: Pipelines, data mgmt, viewers, model training
ref_note: LICONN: 30d×32 V100s≈$10k; plus semantic classifier 16 V100s×38h; 10x multiplier for multiple models

name: Capital base
definition: Scopes + facility + core SW + initial training

name: Peak FLOPs/s GPU
ref_note: H100 FP16 1,979 TFLOPs; current connectomics uses FP32 but FP16 reasonable at scale

name: GPU cost per hour
definition: Costs for access to 1h of GPU

name: Cost drop compute/year
ref_note: Based on historical compute cost trends

name: Cost drop storage/year
ref_note: Based on historical storage cost trends

name: Active storage cost
ref_note: S3 Frequent Access $0.021/GB; on-prem assumed 8x cheaper at scale

name: Archive storage cost
ref_note: S3 Archive Instant $0.004/GB; on-prem assumed 2x cheaper

name: Lossless compression
ref_note: Per Wellcome Trust Report; compression parallel to image acquisition

name: Lossy compression
ref_note: 120x compression demonstrated for EM data; parallel to image acquisition

name: Label overhead
ref_note: Estimate for image overlays and annotations

name: Active retention
definition: How long active copies are kept

name: Archive retention
definition: How long archive copies are kept

name: FLOPs registration/tile
ref_note: MICrONS: 230h×1200 T4s (6.5 TFLOPS)=6.46B TFLOPs for 14.4M tiles≈450/tile

name: Segmentation FLOPs/voxel
ref_note: LSDs: 2M FLOP/voxel (1/100 of FFN's 2.42×10⁸); see Nature Methods supplements

name: Registration rate
definition: PV processed per day per GPU

name: Segmentation rate
definition: PV processed per day per GPU

name: Brain area repetitions
definition: How often experiments cover the same brain volume (different states)

name: Connectomics scan percentage
definition: Percent of recorded volume for aligned structural/functional datasets

name: Neurons at single resolution
definition: Number of individual neurons that can be recorded at single neuron resolution

name: Simulation hours
definition: Total hours of simulation to run

name: FLOPS time-based lower
definition: FLOPS per second of sim lower bound

name: Experiment length
definition: Total duration of recording across multiple sessions

name: Brain volume coverage
definition: Percentage of total brain volume to record

name: Experiment data volume
definition: Uncompressed raw data generated by experiment
